msbt.message: ! You came! I took your advice. I'm moving.The bad news I won't be around to compare muscles with. The good news I get to lift all my furniture!Keep getting stronger! I'll be cheering for you.
Yo, ! It's good to see you. I'm taking your advice. Today is my last day on the island.I don't want you slacking off once I'm gone. Keep those muscles bulging, !

Thanks for talking sense into me, . I've decided to move, .Did you know I named all the sweat stains in the carpet? I'm really gonna miss 'em. Especially Markus.Guess I'll be sweatin' up a new place soon. See ya, !
Hey, ! You can probably tell, but I'm moving out.I'm glad you stopped by though. It just wouldn't feel right if we didn't compare biceps one last time.I'll never forget you or your amazing delts, !

Hey! Who are you? My name's . It's great to meet you, but it's my last day here.Do you work out? Of course you do. Just LOOK at you! Figures I'd meet another fitness buff on my way out.Judging by your biceps, we would have been best buds. I hope we meet again, !

Oh! Aren't you ? It's good to see you again!It's too bad we won't have a chance to hang out. I'm moving off the island today, .I haven't decided where I'm moving to though Where could I show off my awesome beach bod?
Come live on my island!
Good luck!

Oh! Aren't you ? It's good to see you again!It's too bad we won't have a chance to hang out. I'm moving off the island today, .I still haven't figured out where I'm moving to, thoughSo where can I show off my awesome beach bod? Oh! Better question! Where can't I?

Hey, nice to meet you. My name is !I know we just met, but my buff beach bod and I are leaving the island today.I haven't decided where I'm headed yet. Maybe I could wander the world performing feats of strength!Well, I hope I run into you later, !
I think I'm gonna travel the world Maybe I'll meet someone stronger than me, !Yes! This is gonna be great. I can't wait to get started!
I finally picked a new place to live! I'm moving to somewhere called !Swing by after I'm settled on . We'll work out together! See ya, !
I think I'm gonna join the circus. I'd be an awesome strongman.And If I spot you in the audience, I'll bring you on stage for a little weightlifting contest, !
It's gonna be so fun being neighbors again!We'll do crunches, and rollouts, and planks, and everything together! Our abs are gonna get so shredded!
Next stop, ! You're gonna have to show me the best places to buy gym gear.
I'm off to ! Their gym's not gonna know what hit it, !
I can't wait to conquer a new island. I bet they've never even seen a four-hour plank, !
Everyone moves on. Sometimes it's to a new island. Sometimes it's from the treadmill to the weight bench.Whoa! I sounded pretty smart just now, . Ha ha!
I'm not gonna slack in my new home!Let's see 1,000 crunches, 1,000 push-ups, and 1,000 squats. That should be a good warm-up!

Smell that? That's all the sweating I've done here. I can't believe I'm leaving it behind.Don't worry though, I'll get my next place smelling just as muscular!Or I will after I've decided where I'm going, !
How about my island?
Good luck!
I'd love to be your neighbor again! I missed working out with you.I'll call up Resident Services to see if I can register again.
Really? Are you sure your island can handle this much muscle?Sounds like fun! We can get the whole place in shape! I'll call Resident Services.
I think I'm gonna travel the world Maybe I'll meet someone stronger than me, !Yes! This is going to be great. I can't wait to get started!
Just got word back from Resident Services on .We're gonna be neighbors!Wait till everyone gets a look at these biceps! I'll see you on , !
I heard back from Resident Services.<10_4 /> They turned me down.They said something about going over a foam-roller ordinance limit. What's that about, ?Oh well. Thanks for the invite!

I checked with Resident Services, but they wouldn't approve my move.They said someone who looks EXACTLY like me is already moving in soon.Do I have a twin? Are they as strong as me? Nah, look at me. That's impossible!
So I checked with Resident Services. They said there's no room for more neighbors.It's understandable. I am pretty buff, after all. Wouldn't want my hugeness to push someone off the island!
I heard from your Resident Services, and they said no. I guess there's no room for new houses.I asked and they said they couldn't even fit a gym. How crazy is that?!
I heard there's already someone on the island who looks just like me.I know having two of me around SOUNDS cool, but the island would sink under all our free weights.
My move-in application was rejected because someone who looks exactly like me filed earlier, .I'd really like to meet them. They sound like the perfect workout buddy! Oh well.
They told me your island wasn't accepting any more residents. I had no idea it was so popular!With how many calories I burn every day, I guess I can't blame them for turning me down, !
Sounds like your island ran out of room! Why didn't you tell me it was so popular?If space ever opens up, gimme a holler!
I'm gonna give Resident Services on another call.Who knows? Maybe I'll get lucky this time, !
Yeah! Do it!
I'm not so sure...
You're probably right. If it was cool for me to move there, they would've said so by now, .Plus, if I keep calling them, I'll get a bad rep. Fewer bad reps, more lifting reps! That's my motto!
